title: Keep one window for the terminal in curses
author: t2_5rnqy2n9
text:
I want to create 2 windows (assume using curses) with one occupied the upper half and the other one using the lower half. I want to use the upper half to display something with the lower part to keep the same terminal as before using curses.

The end product I want to create is something similar to gdb tui.

Is there any way to make it happen??
